name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Garrett BARCLAY, Appellant

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Garrett BARCLAY, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Judgment of sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Alan M. Shpigel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael L. Turner, Philadelphia, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
453 A.2d 333
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Garrett BARCLAY, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Dec. 6, 1982.
Decided Dec. 29, 1982.
Alan M. Shpigel, Philadelphia, for appellant.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Michael L. Turner, Philadelphia, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
